page.title: 02A Day in the Life of Jenny
page.content: I woke up,washed and dressed.At 8.30 I played draughts with my brother and I beat him.It was time to walk to school. Daddy said that after school I could go with him to the radio station. When I get to school I talked to my friends until Mrs. Phillips marked the register and we went into Prayers.We did Maths and English.John and Robert did a Maths program on the computer. The playbell rang and we stood behind our chairs and went out.The nurse examined in the afternoon.She tested my heart with a stethoscope. After school at 3.30 I went to the radio station and joined in with some of the poems Daddy was reading to the patients in Penyval.Later I got my nightie on and went to bed 7.00.A sensible time for a seven year old girl to go to bed.
